ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those are the Signs of the Wise Book -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: These are the verses of the sagacious Book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: These are the verses of the Wise Book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: These are the verses of the Book of wisdom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: These are verses of the wise Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: These are Ayat of the Wise Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: These are verses of the Book of Wisdom
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those are the signs of the Wise Book
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: These are revelations of the wise Scripture,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: These are the verses of the Book of wisdom,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: These are verses of the Wise Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: These are the signs of the wise Book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: These are Verses of the Wise Book,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: These are Verses of the Wise Book (the Quran).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those are the verses of the Wise Book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: These are the Verses of the Wise Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: These are verses of the wise Book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [31:2] Those, namely, these signs, are the signs of the wise Book, the Qur’ān, the one containing wisdom (the genitive annexation [āyātu’l-kitābi’l-hakīm] has the [partitive] meaning of min, ‘from’);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (These are revelations of the wise Scripture) this surah consists of verses of the Qur'an which explain the lawful and the unlawful, the commands and prohibitions,
